kv1.4:5.3: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?
kv1.4:5.4: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ vicikicchaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:5.5: Ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṃkolo, ekabījī, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme … pe …
kv1.4:5.9: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?
kv1.4:6.2: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ jahati, vicikicchaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:6.3: Ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno … pe …
kv1.4:6.5: ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?
kv1.4:7.2: Vicikicchaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:7.3: Ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno … pe …
kv1.4:7.5: ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?
kv1.4:8.3: Ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṃkolo, ekabījī, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme … pe …
kv1.4:8.7: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, ekadesaṃ ariyakantehi sīlehi na samannāgatoti?
kv1.4:9.1: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?
kv1.4:9.2: Oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ jahati, oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:9.3: Ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv1.4:10.2: Oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ jahati, oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:10.3: Ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv1.4:11.2: Oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ jahati, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:11.3: Ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv1.4:12.2: Oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ jahati, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese jahatīti.
kv1.4:12.3: Ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na sakadāgāmī, ekadesaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?
kv1.4:13.1: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?
kv1.4:13.2: Aṇusahagataṃ kāmarāgaṃ jahati, aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:13.3: Ekadesaṃ anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv1.4:14.2: Aṇusahagataṃ kāmarāgaṃ jahati, aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:14.3: Ekadesaṃ anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na anāgāmī … pe …
kv1.4:14.5: ekadesaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv1.4:15.2: Aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ jahati, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:15.3: Ekadesaṃ anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na anāgāmī … pe …
kv1.4:15.5: ekadesaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv1.4:16.3: Ekadesaṃ anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ na anāgāmī, ekadesaṃ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, ekadesaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?
kv1.4:17.1: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?
kv1.4:17.2: Rūparāgaṃ arūparāgaṃ mānaṃ uddhaccaṃ avijjaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:17.3: Ekadesaṃ arahā, ekadesaṃ na arahā, ekadesaṃ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṃkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, (ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ) ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?
kv1.4:18.2: Rūparāgaṃ arūparāgaṃ jahati, mānaṃ uddhaccaṃ avijjaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:18.3: Ekadesaṃ arahā, ekadesaṃ na arahā … pe …
kv1.4:18.5: ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?
kv1.4:19.2: Mānaṃ jahati, uddhaccaṃ avijjaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese ekadese jahatīti.
kv1.4:19.3: Ekadesaṃ arahā, ekadesaṃ na arahā … pe …
kv1.4:19.5: ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?
kv1.4:20.2: Uddhaccaṃ avijjaṃ tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese jahatīti.
kv1.4:20.3: Ekadesaṃ arahā, ekadesaṃ na arahā, ekadesaṃ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṃ vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṃkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, ekadesaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?
kv1.4:27.4: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
kv1.4:27.5: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—
